text: Cheryl Lea Bustos (n√©e Callahan; born October 17, 1961) is an American journalist, healthcare executive, and politician. Bustos was the U.S. Representative for Illinois's 17th congressional district from 2013 to 2023. She is a member of the Democratic Party. Bustos was the first woman elected to Congress from her district. In April 2021, Bustos announced that she would not run for another term in 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== *Representative Cheri Bustos official U.S. House website *Cheri Bustos for Congress * * * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Journalists from Illinois Category:Writers from Springfield, Illinois Category:Politicians from Springfield, Illinois Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Cheri Bustos
